ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] Forage gets better!
ygData.msgSnippet: And the wizard didn t let one of the melee classes have it! GRRRRRRRR GRRRRRRRR I probably shouldn t start this but....  I know many argue that all classes
ygData.messageBody:
And the wizard didn't let one of the melee classes have it!

GRRRRRRRR
GRRRRRRRR

I probably shouldn't start this but.... I know many argue that all classes
should be in lottos. Or that if the wizard has been there all day he should
get some right over the warrior who just showed up, etc. And I know FBSS,
SMR, Ykesha, M2H are great trade items but COME ON! I won an fbss with
Halana and gave it to the ranger who had been camping it for like 2 weeks,
losing countless lottos to caster classes. I'm certainly not trying to say
I'm altruistic but dang, when that dropable shaman belt drops in Hate, I
want people to say HALANA!!! not keep it for their own trade.

And Bards are kind of left out of the loop even more being the most hybrid
of the hybrids....I've been in lord room lottos where bards were not even
allowed in the Ykesha lotto because "they don't need them as much as
rangers.' Puuuhhhleeeeeeze.

Anyway, just my feelings on the subject :)

Happy Wednesday

-----Original Message-----
From: John_Senior@... [mailto:John_Senior@...]
Sent: Thursday, March 30, 2000 4:38 AM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Forage gets better!


I noticed this also, being a woodelf bard my forage raised to 51. I am very
pleased as I have got into a habit of pressing forage all the time, the
higher the skill the more food I'm gonna have =)
I only managed to raise the skill to 51 so not sure what it caps at, I'm
hoping something like 75-80 (100 would be nice). I wonder now if they
raised any other skill caps in yesterdays patch.

Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 42 Songs <Guardians of Light>
Veeshan Server

Ps, Lost a roll on a sash last night, out of the classes that were in the
group (bard, ranger, monk, wizard, cleric and druid). The wizard won
<sigh>. I rolled a lousy 23 and the wizard got 83.





"Corey de Danann" <corey@...> on 29/03/2000 22:08:21

Please respond to eqbards@onelist.com

To: eqbards@onelist.com
cc: (bcc: John Senior/M&G)
Subject: [eqbards] Forage gets better!




From: "Corey de Danann" <corey@...>

Hey all! Good news for those us who like the Forage skill! I was happily
running along today hitting my forage button as I always do, when I go the
message: You have become better at Forage (41). Yippeee. They have raised
the skill cap on forage. I had to log out before I found out what the max
was, but I thought I'd pass that along to you all.


Llyrean Daoine'Sidhe
Bard of the 23rd Ballad, on E'ci
